channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN holds regular disaster mitigation seminars for international students, providing the knowledge that foreign residents need to stay safe. We introduce a seminar at Kanazawa University.
